Class dom.session.BaseFacet 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----dom.session.BaseFacet
Subclasses:
DirectViewAccessFacet, DObjectFacet, DObjectViewFacet
public abstract class BaseFacet
extends java.lang.Object
Root facet class to provide basic revokation semantics. It provides an abstract superclass for all kinds of facets...i.e. DObjectFacets (for facets between mutually untrusting DObjects) as well as the DObjectView facet (the facet the DObject gives the View)

Author:
Scott Lewis
Source Code:
BaseFacet.java

Constructor Detail

BaseFacet

public BaseFacet(DObject owner) throws NullFacetException
Constructor for this class. All subclasses must provide a non-null reference to the DObject that is to be the owner of this facet.
Parameters:
owner - the owner of this newly-constructed facet
Throws:
NullFacetException - thrown if owner is null
Method Detail

createNewClosure

public static Closure createNewClosure(java.lang.Class aClass,
                                       java.lang.String methodName,
                                       java.lang.Object[] params)
Given a Class object, a string identifying the method, and an array of Objects representing parameters, this will return a Closure Object to use for subsequently passing onto a receiver.
Parameters:
aClass - the Class that will be expected of the receiver. If this first parameter is null, it means to lookup directly upon the class of the receiving object for the given method
methodName - the String identifying which method to invoke on the given Class
params - the Object [] containing the params to pass on as part of Closure returned
Returns:
Closure that will represent the given

getID

public final DObjectID getID()
Get the id of the DObject that owns this facet. This method cannot be overridden.

revoke

public final boolean revoke(DObject theOwner) throws NullFacetException
Revoke this facet. This method cannot be overridden.
Parameters:
theOwner - the DObject that owns this facet
Returns:
true if successfully revoked, false if DObject key provided does not match one for this facet.
Throws:
NullFacetException - thrown if already revoked

overrideableRevoke

protected boolean overrideableRevoke()
Subclass overrideable code that gets called when a facet is revoked.

isRevoked

public final boolean isRevoked()
Check to see if this facet is revoked (without throwing exception)
Returns:
true if this facet has been revoked, false otherwise.

exceptionIfRevoked

protected final void exceptionIfRevoked() throws NullFacetException
Utility method for subclasses to throw exception if this facet has previously been revoked.
Throws:
NullFacetException - thrown if this facet has previously been revoked.

getOwner

protected final DObject getOwner()
Utility method for subclasses to get access to the owner of this facet.
Returns:
DObject reference to our owner. Should not be exposed via public method.
